sec.p: Sex ratio at chick-fledging (55.22%), when juveniles first return to the colony (54.62%), or at first breeding attempt (53.27%) did not vary among cohorts hatched between 2000 and 2003. Sex ratio did not change significantly between fledging and first returns (Proportion test; P = 0.83, N = 1112/866), between first returns and first breeding attempts ( P = 0.65, N = 866/597), or between fledging and first breeding attempts ( P = 0.47, N = 1112/597).
